name: Myselw
description:
Myselw: My selfish wish chapter 1 is a fantasy platformer game. The protagonist suffers from a curse and her family is gone. She decides to find them, but it will not be so easy.

  • Difficult.
  • The game has 21 levels.
  • Some levels are very dark and you need to navigate yourself with the Light Globe.
GAMEPLAY

HEALTH: The red bar is the player's health.

STAMINA: The green bar is the player's stamina which is used for sprinting, dashing and special jumps. You can gain stamina from several plants or items through the map.

CURSE INDICATOR: The pink bar and the pink timer will show you the curse progess. If the pink bar is full and the timer will reach 0 the player dies. You can reduce the curse progress with the blue candles.

TIMER: In a separate box there is the timer and it shows you how long did it take to complete the current level.

REWIND CRYSTAL: If it reaches 0 and you die again than the game is over. You can gain Rewind Crystals through the levels.

TOOLS: In the game there are 2 throwable items. The White Stone and the Light Globe.

  • White Stone - you can kill the enemy with it.
  • Light Globe - you can light a small area with it.

SECONDARY JUMP: If you have enough stamina you need to do a normal jump and while you be in the air you need to hold the secondary jump button and you will perform a bigger jump (Only work after the curse has been activated.)

In the game you need to pay attention to both the stamina management and the curse progress, because if you run out of stamina at a place where you must use a stamina required movement you get traped. The curse progress is a feature which will give you some hard time. If you hesitate too much the curse will kill the protagonist.

CONTROLS

You can play this game with a keyboard or a gamepad. You can fully customize the controls on both of them.

BLACK LOCUST

I’m a solo developer who started to learn programing and drawing from scratch in the summer of 2018 and I'm finally releasing my first game, Myselw.
